New Records: The 2024-25 Cavs achieved a 9-0 start to the season, the best in franchise history.
Key Match Events: The Cavs made 17 threes as a team, with Sam Merrill, Georges Niang, and Caris LeVert all playing huge roles off the bench.
Pre-Game Insights: The odds were in the Cleveland Cavaliers' favor as they looked to remain unbeaten in the first nine games of the 2024-25 season.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavs have been fantastic to begin the year, and in the third season of the Donovan Mitchell era, it seems as though the team is finally striking the right balance in making the most of its core four.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs will be hoping for is that they remain healthy and that this start of the season mirrors the team's new level, more so than it being a flash in the pan.
Others: The Cavs will take on a 7-1 Golden State Warriors team that defeated the Celtics on Wednesday night.
